Until a year ago, the role of autonomous turrets would be served by the Bright Ones. But, since the collapse of space travel, the UNSS warehouse managers became the easiest-to-bribe people in the whole Siren System. So, why keep wasting the Bright Ones when there's a cheaper alternative?

This artifact will help you experience the best in life. Crush your enemies! See them driven before you! Hear the lament ... Ok, times have changed, so maybe the last item on Conan's list can be quietly cut out. How I miss the old times!
Survival Manual
Survival Manual <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>raises</color> all three <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>main attributes</color> by <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>3</color>.
From "stay hydrated" to "do not eat yellow snow". All the essential tips on how to survive your Siren System adventure on one data store!
Increases the commander's <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Combat power</color> attribute by<color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD> 3</color>.
While a ton of tech is banned in the Solar System, the Siren System is a wild frontier. Here, blowing six-inch hole through a gentleman clad in military-grade armor is considered fair game.
DIY Kit
A <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>Building Zone</color> is <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>constructed next</color> to the <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>commander's location</color>.
You do not need a professional; you can build it yourself! Be a man! True Alpha! Come on, you chicken! Come a ki yi yippee yippee yay!
Adds <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>20% bonus damage</color> to <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>ranged</color> units.

Understanding the crystal-based technology of the Primals is beyond even the most gifted minds. Tumori shamans consider it straight-up magic. But, has a lack of knowledge ever prevented anybody from using an unknown phenomenon as a weapon?
Reduces enemy <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>ranged damage</color> by <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>20%</color>.
If it was really smart, it would help you finish college and prevent you from enlisting. That would be the perfect way to protect you from bullets. But, here we are. Now give me fifty, rookie!
Antigrav
Increases <color=SOTS_COLOR_GREEN>movement range</color> of friendly units by <color=SOTS_COLOR_GOLD>2 hexes</color>.

Just a portable version of the giant machines that enable starships to gracefully float suspended in the air. I guess it was only a matter of time utill someone ripped it from a dead Acheron and strapped it to their belt.
Molvark

After they escaped from a Fossorian base, it only took the Molvarks a few weeks to exterminate several indigenous species. A moment of silence for Fungy-piglet and Crystal-bird. Animals incapable of surviving long enough to obtain proper scientific names.
Trifid Seedling
The Seedlings are pretty vicious, but they are not evil; they just need your nutritious body to grow to their full-size.
Trifid

The name of this invasive species of carnivorous plant is pretty self-explanatory. But in case you have been living under a rock, I can sumarise ... nah, you know what, just read the John Windham masterpiece, and then we'll speak again.
Mother Plant, instead of a regular attack, shoots seeds that instantly grow into "Triffid Seedlings". After spitting out ten seeds, it withers away and dies.

MULTIVERSE OF MADNESS
Eight identical starting positions, the most fair way to measure your skills against others.

Once upon a time, a mad scientist traveled to a remote area to experiment with the development of secret weapons. He created 8 spaces with different environments, but identical starting conditions, and placed 4 factions there to test his weapons. The project got cancelled, but the entire location remains as a very balanced battleground to this day. We just connected the islands. How, I hear you ask? Well, that's what you'll have to figure out yourself.
Great, you have earned the 'Multiplayer Maniac' trophy!! (Warning, this is not a achievement)
You can't get anywhere from this teleport, all teleports of this color from the other islands lead here.
DOOM OF EDEN

Visit the place where top-ranking officers go on vacation and enjoy a relaxing stay around the recreational station Eden. <color=SOTS_COLOR_YELLOW>WARNING:</color> This type of relaxation can be very challenging. If you want to enjoy it, choose the <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>EASY</color> difficulty. Only if you are truly very experienced, you can try <color=SOTS_COLOR_BRONZE>MEDIUM</color>. And if you're not Adam, don't even consider the <color=SOTS_COLOR_RED>HARD</color> one.
Welcome to the top-secret recreational UNSS location called EDEN.
Good job! You have protected our beautiful UNSS recreational center, EDEN. As a reward, you receive a VIP pass to the water park, we'll definitely build it within the next 10 years!
